title: Matthew Stafford says he'll be back in 2026 for 18th season

sources.name: Pro Football Talk
sources.title: Matthew Stafford says he'll be back in 2026 for 18th season
sources.description: Earlier this week, Rams head coach Sean McVay and Rams General Manager Les Snead each said that the organization would give quarterback Matthew Stafford time to decide if he would like to return for an 18th season.
